SOLD ITEMS:
1933 Canadian Goudey (World Wide Gum) V353 Babe Ruth #93 graded BVG 1 Poor.  There is a stamp on the front (which actually does not detract that much from the image, it almost adds to the image) & on the back there is what appears to be a tatoo (or possibly stamp).  The card back is the rarer all english verision & the front looks identital to #149 1933 Goudey Ruth: SOLD
